ygData.subject: Re: New bard website
ygData.msgSnippet: I love it =) Thanks for the effort. Will people be able to post about songs ala Everlore? Dank McGillicuty ... From: Rokenn Swiftsong  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I love it =) Thanks for the effort. Will people be able to post about songs
ala Everlore?

Dank McGillicuty


----- Original Message -----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...>
To: <eqss@...>; <AllaKhazam@...>; <EQ-Bards@onelist.com>;
<EQBards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, November 15, 1999 4:13 PM
Subject: [eqbards] New bard website


> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> Once upon a time Goatanos complied a Song Analysis, detailing each of the
> songs in a bards song book. Over time the Song Analysis fell more and
more
> out of date, due to the dynamic nature of EverQuest. Working with my
fellow
> bards on the Concert Hall message board and the EQBards mailing list on
> OneList I have updated the Song Analysis. Stop on by and check it out.
>
> EQ Bard Song Analysis
> http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/
>
> Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
